sentences.en: A group of students roamed the riverbank.
A herd of about 100 African buffalo meanders quietly along a riverbank.
sentences.cn: 一群非洲水牛，大约100只，安详地顺着河岸漫步。

sentences.en: Afterwards, we picnicked on the riverbank.
Asas the race began, the riverbank became even more lively.
sentences.cn: 划龙船比赛开始的时候, 河边更是热闹.

sentences.en: But he sensed something like it, sensed the awesome truth, and as he stood there staring at the riverbank he was seeing it for all humankind.
sentences.cn: 但他横生了一些感觉，更是对某种令人敬畏的真理有了体察，当他站在那里注视河岸时，整个人类都因此而受益。

sentences.en: Every morning the first thing Cheng does is exercise along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 每天早上他的第一项必修课就是沿着河岸做练习。

sentences.en: Feiyun River middle reaches, riverbank Gate Creek this collection, the environment elegant.
sentences.cn: 飞云江中游 、 漈门溪于此汇集, 环境优雅.

sentences.en: He had been walking on the riverbank observing a high tide.
sentences.cn: 他曾在河堤上行走,观察涨潮的情况.

sentences.en: I had a good time riding along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 我沿着河岸骑得很开心.

sentences.en: I hastily left the riverbank, afraid I might disturb you.
sentences.cn: 当时我急忙离开了河岸, 生怕打搅了你.

sentences.en: I walked along the riverbank and fell into the river unexpectedly.
sentences.cn: 我沿着河堤散步,没想到掉到河里了.

sentences.en: I want to a walk riverbank singing my favorite songs.
sentences.cn: 我想在河边散步唱我喜欢的歌.

sentences.en: Our four almost sank when we crashed into the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 我们的四人赛艇撞上了河岸，差一点沉没。

sentences.en: The general ranged his men along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 将军命令他的士兵沿河岸排队.

sentences.en: They set out in a westerly direction along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着河岸向西出发了。

sentences.en: Wastewater can be purified by a riverbank filtration system.
sentences.cn: 河岸渗滤系统对污水具有净化功能.

trans.tran_en: A riverbank is the land along the edge of a river
